電話號碼已存在, 請勿重複註冊: There already exists an phone number registered with this number.
帳號已存在: The account already exists, please re-enter.
密碼須超過 6 位數: The password must be at least 6 characters, please re-enter.
網路異常, 請重新嘗試: The network is abnormal, please try again.
驗證碼已發送至您的手機: The verification code has been sent to your phone.
註冊成功, 請按登入按鈕進行登入: Registration is successful, please click the button to log in
找不到可用的 QRcode，請再試一次: The QRcode is not available, please check.
請輸入發送至您指定手機門號之簡訊驗證碼: Please enter receiving phone number for SMS verification code.
請輸入與銀行卡相同之真實姓名以確保您的權益: Please enter the same real name as the bank card to ensure your rights.
請輸入英文或數字6-12位數: The password must be 6-12 and contain both numbers and letters characters.
